lead_paragraph: Tokyo's Olympic bid team on Wednesday dangled dollar signs in front of the IOC, with a vow to leverage Asia's massive marketing potential were it awarded the right to stage the 2020 Summer Games.

headline.main: Tokyo Dangles Dollars in Bid to Win Games
headline.print_headline: Tokyo Dangles Dollars in Bid to Win Games

snippet: Tokyo's Olympic bid team on Wednesday dangled dollar signs in front of the IOC, with a vow to leverage Asia's massive marketing potential were it awarded the right to stage the 2020 Summer Games....
